item.title: About
item.description: CONTEXT My name is Jason Dexter and I’m an R-Programmer and Data-Analyst based out of Berkeley, CA, where I live with my lovely wife 💃 and our two cats 🐈 🐈 In graduate school I was introduced to programming, first base-R then Python. Programming was difficult at first, then I began to resonate with the idea 💡 of solving problems programmatically. Now I’m a nerd 🤓 when it comes to automation - there’s something intoxicating about the process of wrangling data using code - it’s simply amazing!
